input: A modern farmhouse-style living room with sliding barn doors, herringbone wood floors, a tufted leather ottoman, and an array of indoor plants without any hanging planters.
edit: Add a hanging planter next to the window.
output: A modern farmhouse-style living room with sliding barn doors, herringbone wood floors, a tufted leather ottoman, and an array of indoor plants with a hanging planter next to the window.
